content: What are the health benefits of consuming flaxseeds?

Flaxseeds are a great source of nutrients and have numerous health benefits. They are rich in fiber, healthy fats, and various vitamins and minerals. Consuming flaxseeds can help lower cholesterol levels, reduce inflammation, and improve digestive health. They are also known to have antioxidant and anti-cancer properties. Additionally, flaxseeds are a good source of plant-based protein and can help promote feelings of fullness, making them useful for weight management.
